mapper.sql: product_rule_id, rule_name, identity_auth,apply_term, apply_amount, max_month_amount, education, sb_situation, car_situation, occupation, monthly_income, working_life, check_phone, check_email, company_name, emergency_contact, social_account, house_situation, accumulation_fund, sesame_branch, loan_use, create_time, create_man, modify_time, modify_man, state, remark
mapper.select: select count(product_rule_id) from product_rule where 1=1 and state = #{state} and rule_name like concat("%",#{ruleName},"%")

select
from product_rule where 1=1 and state = #{state}
mapper.insert: insert into product_rule (product_rule_id, rule_name, identity_auth, apply_term, apply_amount, max_month_amount, education, sb_situation, car_situation, occupation, monthly_income, working_life, check_phone, check_email, company_name, emergency_contact, social_account, house_situation, accumulation_fund, sesame_branch, loan_use, create_time, create_man, modify_time, modify_man, state, remark) values (#{productRuleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityAuth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyTerm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxMonthAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monthlyIncome,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workingLife,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emergencyContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{socialAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accumulationFund,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sesameBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update product_rule set rule_name = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_auth = #{identityAuth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_amount = #{applyAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_term = #{applyTerm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_month_amount = #{maxMonthAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sb_situation = #{sbSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_situation = #{carSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, occupation = #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, monthly_income = #{monthlyIncome,jdbcType=INTEGER}, working_life = #{workingLife,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_phone = #{checkPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_email = #{checkEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emergency_contact = #{emergencyContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, social_account = #{socialAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_situation = #{houseSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accumulation_fund = #{accumulationFund,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sesame_branch = #{sesameBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loan_use = #{loanUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where product_rule_id = #{productRuleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: UPDATE product_rule SET state = 2 WHERE product_rule_id = #{arg0}
